item.title: 历峰集团称按固定汇率计算季度销售额增长 1
item.description: 奢侈品集团历峰集团（Richemont）周二表示，按固定汇率计算，截至 6 月份的三个月销售额增长了 1%，但按当前汇率计算则下降了 1%。【原文：Luxury group and Cartier-owner Richemont reported a 1% rise in sales at constant exchange rates in the three months through June, though they were down 1% at current exchange rates, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 七国集团政府债务：下一个市场热点？
item.description: 随着大选给财政前景蒙上阴影，全球最大经济体的巨额债务又开始令金融市场感到不安。【原文：Huge debt piles among the world's biggest economies are starting to unnerve financial markets again, as elections cloud the fiscal outlook.】

item.title: ASML 的订单有望受益于人工智能芯片热潮
item.description: ASML 是计算机芯片制造商的顶级设备供应商，随着客户扩大产能以满足对人工智能芯片的蓬勃需求，预计其新任老板将在周三发布第二季度财报时公布大量新订单。【原文：ASML , the top equipment supplier to computer chip makers, is expected to report an influx of new orders when its new boss delivers second-quarter results on Wednesday, as customers expand capacity to meet booming demand for AI chips.】

item.title: 独家报道与德国有联系的物流公司帮助受制裁的俄罗斯制造商
item.description: 2022 年 2 月俄罗斯军队入侵乌克兰后不久，货运商汉宏全球物流公司通知其莫斯科业务部的员工，公司将撤出俄罗斯。一些曾在这家德国公司工作过的人看到了商机。【原文：Soon after Russian forces invaded Ukraine in February 2022, freight shipper Hellmann Worldwide Logistics informed staff at its Moscow business it was pulling out of Russia. Some people who had worked for the German company saw an opportunity.】

item.title: 中国平安通过可转债交易融资 35 亿美元
item.description: 中国平安保险公司周二表示，该公司已通过出售可转换债券筹集到 35 亿美元资金。【原文：China's Ping An Insurance , said on Tuesday it has raised $3.5 billion through a convertible bond sale.】

item.title: 早间竞价鲍威尔和特朗普赢得市场关注
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 中国试图一石多鸟推进房地产救援
item.description: 在中国政府下令中国各城市购买新竣工的公寓并将其改造成经济适用房后，他们采取的第一个步骤就是公布扩大补贴资格的计划，并在此过程中解决其他经济问题。【原文：After Beijing ordered Chinese cities to buy newly-completed apartments and turn them into affordable housing, the first steps they took were to unveil plans to broaden eligibility for subsidies and fix other economic headaches in the process.】

item.title: 日本继续警告日元不要大幅下跌
item.description: 日本内阁官房长官林芳正周二表示，日本当局随时准备在货币市场采取一切可能的措施，因为过度波动的走势是不可取的。【原文：Japanese authorities stand ready to take all possible measures in the currency market as excessively volatile moves are undesirable, Chief Cabinet Secretary Yoshimasa Hayashi said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国拖累亚洲股市下跌，美元受追捧
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市下跌，因为投资者在思考特朗普获胜的前景以及这对中国意味着什么，而美元则连续第二天攀升，尽管美联储的鸽派言论助长了对美国今年更多降息的押注。【原文：Asian shares fell on Tuesday as investors pondered the prospect of a Trump victory and what that would mean for China, while the dollar climbed for a second day even though dovish Fed comments fuelled bets of more U.S. rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 鲍威尔言论令 9 月降息成为焦点，美元随之漂移
item.description: 由于美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的言论增强了9月份降息的理由，美元周二在五周低点附近震荡，而加密货币因前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）连任的可能性上升而上涨。【原文：The dollar hung around five-week lows on Tuesday as comments from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell bolstered the case for a rate cut in September, while cryptocurrenices gained on rising odds of former President Donald Trump getting reelected.】

item.title: 日本找到治疗僵尸企业的 "隐形 "良方：让它们倒闭
item.description: 在其 72 年的大部分时间里，藤田仁司的公司只是一家加工金属零件的小企业。后来，它做了一件对日本小型制造商来说不寻常的事：扩大规模，在过去十年中收购了两家邻近的公司。【原文：For much of its 72 years, Hitoshi Fujita's company was just another mom-and-pop business grinding out metal parts. Then it did something unusual for a small Japanese manufacturer: it expanded, buying two neighboring firms in the last decade.】

item.title: 油价因担心中国需求而下跌
item.description: 油价周二走低，原因是市场担心中国经济放缓会抑制需求，尽管越来越多的人认为美国联邦储备委员会最快将于9月份开始下调关键利率，但这限制了油价的跌幅。【原文：Oil prices edged lower on Tuesday on worries about a slowing Chinese economy crimping demand, though a growing consensus that the U.S. Federal Reserve will begin cutting its key interest rate as soon as September limited declines.】

item.title: 五月火车脱轨事故后力拓第二季度铁矿石发货量不及预期
item.description: 全球矿业巨头力拓（Rio Tinto , RIO.L）周二公布的第二季度铁矿石出货量低于分析师预期，反映了5月中旬火车出轨事故对生产造成的影响。【原文：Global mining giant Rio Tinto , RIO.L on Tuesday posted second-quarter iron ore shipments below analyst estimates, reflecting impacts to production from a train derailment in mid-May.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进派 Starboard 增持 Tinder 所有者 Match 6.5% 股份
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，激进投资者 Starboard 持有 Tinder 所有者 Match 超过 6.5% 的股份，如果不能成功扭亏为盈，Starboard 将推动 Match 出售。【原文：Activist investor Starboard has a position in Tinder owner Match of more than 6.5% and is pushing for a possible sale if a turnaround isn't successful, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 价值数万亿美元的团体敦促政府采取行动阻止自然损失
item.description: 包括联合利华、欧舒丹和伊贝尔德罗拉在内的 100 多家公司呼吁各国政府制定更严厉的政策，以实现联合国提出的在本十年末制止自然损失的目标。【原文：More than 100 companies, including Unilever , L'Occitane and Iberdrola , have called on governments to enact tougher policies to reach a U.N. goal on halting nature loss by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 通用汽车不再重申 2025 年 100 万辆电动汽车产能预测
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors）周一拒绝重申其之前宣布的预测，即到 2025 年底，该公司在北美的电动汽车产能将达到 100 万辆。【原文：General Motors on Monday declined to reiterate its previously announced forecast that it would have 1 million units of electric vehicle production capacity in North America by the end of 2025.】

item.title: 亚洲 中国苦难加深，美国曲线陡峭
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 调查显示，英国建筑公司面临最严重的招聘问题
item.description: 一项调查显示，建筑和工程公司在英国工人短缺问题上首当其冲，这凸显了首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）在实现其促进住宅建设和基础设施建设计划方面所面临的挑战。【原文：Construction and engineering firms are bearing the brunt of Britain's shortage of workers, according to a survey that underscores the challenge for Prime Minister Keir Starmer to meet his plans to boost home-building and infrastructure.】

item.title: 美联储戴利表示，战胜通胀的信心正在增强
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周一表示，"信心正在增强"，通胀率正朝着美国中央银行设定的 2% 的目标迈进，这是决策者为降息设定的门槛。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly on Monday said "confidence is growing" that inflation is heading toward the U.S. central bank's 2% goal, the bar that policymakers have set for cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 阿根廷平行比索因新经济措施而走强，股票指数大幅下跌
item.description: 在哈维尔-米莱伊总统的政府于上周末推出的新经济措施生效后，阿根廷平行市场比索兑美元汇率周一升值，而当地股市则受到影响。【原文：The Argentine parallel market peso appreciated against the U.S. dollar on Monday while the local stock market suffered, after new economic measures introduced by President Javier Milei's government over the weekend took effect.】

item.title: 鲍威尔表示将留任美联储主席直至任期结束
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周一表示，他没有计划在任期届满前离开美国央行行长的职位，这给一些忠于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的人的断言泼了一盆冷水，这些人认为，如果前总统重新入主白宫，鲍威尔将很快失业。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Monday said he has no plans to leave his post as head of the U.S. central bank before his term expires, pouring cold water on assertions by some loyalists to Donald Trump that Powell would be swiftly out of a job should the former president regain the White House.】

item.title: 业内人士称，现货以太坊 ETF 可能于 7 月 23 日开始交易
item.description: 据三位业内人士透露，美国监管机构已告知申请推出与全球第二大加密货币以太币价格挂钩的交易所交易基金的八家公司中的至少三家，他们可能会在下周二（7 月 23 日）最终批准新产品的推出。【原文：US regulators have told at least three of the eight firms applying to launch exchange-traded funds tied to the price of ether, the world's second-largest cryptocurrency, that they are likely to give the final go-ahead for the new products to launch next Tuesday, July 23, according to three industry sources.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，迪士尼内部通信在黑客攻击后泄露到网上
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，华特迪士尼内部 Slack 工作场所协作系统的数据已在网上泄露，其中包括关于广告活动、工作室技术和面试人选的讨论。【原文：Data from Walt Disney's internal Slack workplace collaboration system have been leaked online, including discussions about ad campaigns, studio technology and interview candidates, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 对冲基金对软件公司的押注创历史新低，摩根士丹利称
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）在一份报告中称，在科技行业出现大范围抛售之后，全球对冲基金上周对美国软件股的投资达到了 "多年来的新低"。【原文：Global hedge funds' exposure to software stocks in the U.S. reached "new multi-year lows" last week after a broader sell-off in the technology sector, Morgan Stanley said in a note.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔称赞通胀问题取得进展
item.description: 美联储主席鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周一表示，今年第二季度的三个美国通胀读数确实 "在一定程度上增加了人们的信心"，即物价上涨的步伐正在以可持续的方式回到美联储的目标，这番话表明，转向降息可能为时不远。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Monday the three U.S. inflation readings over the second quarter of this year do "add somewhat to confidence" that the pace of price increases is returning to the Fed's target in a sustainable fashion, remarks that suggest a turn to interest rate cuts may not be far off.】

item.title: 雪佛龙公司前首席执行官肯尼斯-德尔去世，享年 87 岁
item.description: 雪佛龙公司周一表示，该公司前董事长兼首席执行官肯尼斯-T-德尔（Kenneth T. Derr）在家人的陪伴下于周五去世，享年 88 岁。【原文：Former Chevron Corp chairman and CEO Kenneth T. Derr, who led the company between 1989 and 1999, died on Friday shortly before his 88th birthday surrounded by his family, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔表示将留任整个主席任期
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周一表示，他一定会完成本届央行领导人的全部任期。【原文：Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said Monday he will definitely finish the full scope of his current central bank leadership term.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔：最新通胀读数处于 "相当不错的位置
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周一表示，今年第二季度的三个通胀读数显示，在使物价上涨速度回归美联储目标方面正在取得 "更多进展"。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Monday the three inflation readings over the second quarter of this year showed "more progress" was being made on bringing the pace of price increases back to the Fed's target.】

item.title: 尽管有降息预期，加拿大企业仍在控制投资
item.description: 加拿大银行周一在其第二季度调查报告中称，加拿大企业预计明年利率将下降多达 100 个基点，但由于需求前景疲软，企业的投资意愿低于平均水平。【原文：Canadian businesses expect interest rates to come down by as much as 100 basis points over the next year but their willingness to invest is below average due to a weak demand outlook, the Bank of Canada said on Monday in its second-quarter survey.】

item.title: 纽约联储发现 6 月份信贷拒绝率上升
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周一公布的最新数据显示，6月份的信贷拒绝率高于2024年早些时候的水平，但略低于一年前的水平。【原文：Credit rejection rates were higher in June than earlier in 2024 but slightly lower than a year ago, new data from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said on Monday.】
